remarks: If a lattice translation is not the identity, then the translation of any atom not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` is different from the atom.  Remark above Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 24-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnnidn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnnidn.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnnidn $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ F =/= ( _I |` B ) ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( F ` P ) =/= P ) $.
